Posts.Content: I am 62 yrs old and have had regular mammograms for 15+ yrs. this year the report said a nodule was more prominent than on prior mammo. They did spot compression and that report said the nodule was present in all views and does not efface. I also had an ultrasound that showed nothing. Which has more weight. The mammo or the ultrasound? My grandmother and 2 aunts had breast cancer. Thanks for any input.
Posts.Title: Mammo vs ultrasound

Posts.Content: I met with surg/dr today and she stilll didn't find anything on ultrasound. She gave me ops. I chose mamo biopsy on the 28 th and if they find nothing they will not biopsy. Hoping for good results on the 28th!!
Posts.Title: Mammo vs ultrasound

Posts.Content: Thanks Bev for your reply. I am just a little worried !!
Posts.Title: Mammo vs ultrasound
